backend/main.mo: Defines user profiles, cases, tasks, activity logs, and evidence types with access-controlled CRUD operations and storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Lists evidence-related feature requirements, associated files, components, and test IDs for build planning.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of all major frontend files including pages, components, and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles and color variables for light and dark themes using OKLCH values.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router, theme provider, auth gate, AppShell layout, and all application routes.
frontend/src/components/accused/AccusedA: Dialog for adding an accused investigation record with file upload handling, size validation, and progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/accused/AccusedF: Provides search and filter inputs for accused records, including name, FIR, police station, and status, with a clear-filters option.
Modal form for creating or editing an accused record, handling validation and submitting mutations.
frontend/src/components/accused/AccusedI: Displays detailed accused information and investigation records, with an option to upload new attachments.
frontend/src/components/accused/AccusedL: Renders a grid of accused records with status badges, edit and detail view dialogs.
frontend/src/components/activity/Activit: Dialog form for logging an officer activity with type selection and description submission.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminOnly.t: Restricts content to admin users, showing a permission error if access is denied.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Handles authentication flow, showing login, profile setup, or gated content based on user state.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Authentication button that logs users in or out using Internet Identity and resets cached queries on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal form that collects officer profile details and saves them using useSaveCallerUserProfile with validation and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/cases/CaseForm.t: Dialog form for creating a new case, validating inputs and submitting via useCreateCase with identity-based investigator assignment.
frontend/src/components/data/LastUpdated: Badge component that displays last-updated time or loading/error states based on props.
frontend/src/components/data/ManualRefre: Small button that triggers manual data refresh and shows a spinning icon while refreshing.
frontend/src/components/evidence/Evidenc: Form for adding evidence to a selected case, supporting type selection and submitting via useAddEvidence.
Main application layout with navigation, header, user menu, and admin-aware links wrapping child content.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskForm.t: Dialog form for creating tasks linked to a case, assigning the current user and submitting via useCreateTask.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication and login state using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data such as user profiles, roles, cases, and related records via an actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and defines CSS variables for light and dark mode color themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AccusedInformationPag: Displays and filters accused records with tabs, search inputs, and a form for creating new entries.
frontend/src/pages/ActivityLogsPage.tsx: Shows officer activity logs with date filtering, manual refresh, and a form to add new logs.
frontend/src/pages/AdminRoleManagementPa: Admin-only UI for assigning user roles by principal ID with form validation and backend mutation.
frontend/src/pages/antf-reference/LawsPa: Renders a page describing NDPS Act provisions with cards outlining key sections and legal details.
frontend/src/pages/antf-reference/Module: Displays operational modules such as intelligence gathering, enforcement, and investigation with objectives and activities.
frontend/src/pages/antf-reference/NdpsSu: Shows classification rules and a table of small and commercial quantities for various NDPS substances.
frontend/src/pages/antf-reference/Proced: Provides detailed SOPs for search, seizure, and arrest processes under ANTF operations.
frontend/src/pages/AntfStructurePage.tsx: Displays ANTF organizational structure and jurisdiction using cards and descriptive text.
frontend/src/pages/CaseDetailPage.tsx: Shows detailed case info with status updates, related tasks, logs, and evidence.
frontend/src/pages/CasesListPage.tsx: Lists all cases with filtering, creation, and navigation to case details.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Provides an overview of cases, tasks, logs, and evidence with quick stats.
frontend/src/pages/EvidencePage.tsx: Displays evidence items with statuses, case links, and form for adding new evidence.
frontend/src/pages/TasksPage.tsx: Lists investigation tasks with filtering, status badges, and task creation.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters, including hash parsing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins for typography, queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata and feature requirements for updating ANTF organizational structure documentation, including hierarchy, roles, staffing, and terminology corrections.
